resources.string: You can use the various options provided to draw whatever you like: from circles, to rectangles, to text, to free lines. You also have the ability to save your images to your Android gallery.
Provides the ability to draw a straight line in any direction
Enables the width of the lines to be changed for any of the other options
Provides a means to change line color
Draws a rectangle or square, whichever the user pleases
Draws a circle or oval, whichever the user pleases
Enables the user to enter any type of text to place on the screen
Clears the current screen; deletes the image without saving it.
Saves the current image to the gallery
Allows the user to erase portions or all of current image
Allows the user to undo the previous or multiple actions
Provides the ability to override a previous deletion
Provides the user the ability to draw free lines
